T02D2266:55b-1: ka kha sya do ha n'a ma /
T02D2266:55b-3: ka kha'i do ha zhes bya ba /
T02D2266:55b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2266:55b-5: da ni yum gyi padma'i nang du gnas pa 'di yin te //
T02D2266:55b-6: lus ni rnam par bcings shing bdud rtsi 'dzag / mgul nas 'khyud pa'i dom bi gzhon nu ma //
T02D2266:55b-7: ga bur 'dzag cing 'di ni dpyid ka'i yal ga yin //
T02D2266:55b-8: kha ni nam mkha' gnas par dpral ba'i stong pa ste //
T02D2266:55b-9: dge dang mi dges ma gos gcer bul //
T02D2266:55b-10: za zhing 'thung yang mya ngan 'das la gnas //
T02D2266:55b-11: rnal 'byor gcer bu bzung nas shin du dga' //
T02D2266:55b-12: nam mkha' dag ni khyab cing brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D2266:55b-13: ga ni nam mkha' 'jo zhing 'jo zhing 'thung bar byed //
T02D2266:55b-14: gang g'a ya mu na ni gnyis ni legs par chings //
T02D2266:55b-16: gha ni dril bu'i sgra yis dpal ldan he ru ka ni mnyes //
T02D2266:55b-17: bdag med ma yis mgul nas yang dang yang du 'khyud //
T02D2266:55b-18: rnal 'byor ma yis rlung rnams yang nas yang du 'pho //
T02D2266:55b-19: khyim bdag mo ni gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang la 'pho //
T02D2266:55b-20: nga ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
T02D2266:55b-21: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo la dge dang mi dge mi 'phro zhing //
T02D2266:55b-22: rgyun du rnal 'byor pa ni bde bar byed nus na //
T02D2266:55b-23: nub mo'i mun pa chad nas 'od gsal stong par 'gyur //
T02D2266:55b-24: tsa ni dga' ba bzhi ni 'di dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2266:55b-25: kye ho mtha' bzhi dang ni bral ba'i sems bzung
T02D2266:55b-26: cig / skad cig bzhi ni yang dag bla ma'i
T02D2266:56a-1: pa'i bag chags kyis ni mi shes so //
T02D2266:56a-2: tsha ni dbang po spongs la dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2266:56a-3: 'dod yon dang ni dngos dang dngos med spongs //
T02D2266:56a-4: cal col gtam rnams dor cig 'di rnams kyis //
T02D2266:56a-5: ro 'di thong la nam mkha' la ni longs spyod kyis //
T02D2266:56a-6: dza ni skye dang rga dang 'chi ba med pa'i nam mkha' yin //
T02D2266:56a-7: gang dang gang du bltas kyang de dang de ru nam mkha'o //
T02D2266:56a-8: ji ltar gnas ba de ltar de ni de nyid do //
T02D2266:56a-9: ji ltar mthong ba de ltar de ni don dam mo //
T02D2266:56a-10: dzha ni me tog mang po'i sa bon ji ltar bsten pa dang //
T02D2266:56a-11: de ltar sna tshogs kyis ni phung po 'grub pa yin ;
T02D2266:56a-12: / sna yis sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gnyis 'thung nus na //
T02D2266:56a-13: yun rings dus dag 'tsho ba la ni the tshom med //
T02D2266:56a-14: skabs 'dir nya yig gis drangs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig
T02D2266:56a-15: med pa 'di 'grel par yang nya ni nga dang
T02D2266:56a-16: mtshungs so zhes pa tsam las ma byung ngo //
T02D2266:56a-17: ta ni kye ho yang dag bla ma'i gsung gi thig le phab //
T02D2266:56a-18: sa gzhi 'gul bas nam mkha' las ni thig le
T02D2266:56a-19: 'dzag / lam log cal col ma byed kye ho
T02D2266:56a-20: rnal 'byor pa // khyod kyis cal col gyis ni lhan skyes mi rtogs so //
T02D2266:56a-21: tha tha'i sgras ni sngags rnams brjod pa dang //
T02D2266:56a-22: tha yi yi ge blangs nas gnas thob 'gyur //
T02D2266:56a-23: tshul bzhin long na ting nge 'dzin ni 'pho par 'gyur //
T02D2266:56a-24: yang dag bla mas nam mkha' go bas byang chub yin //
T02D2266:56a-25: da ni sngags rnams brjod cing dom bi long //
T02D2266:56a-26: gtum mos bsregs shing chu rnams 'dzag par 'gyur //
T02D2266:56a-27: da ma ru ni aa na ha yi skad du grags //
T02D2266:56a-28: da ma ru de bzung bas rnal 'byor ma sgra yin //
T02D2266:56a-29: dha ni ril ba pho bas rnam pa gcig tu khyab par gyur //
T02D2266:56a-30: sems ni 'pho bas lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2266:56a-31: dbang po lnga yang 'pho zhing lhan skyes der zhugs so //
T02D2266:56a-32: gab pa'i khyim bdag mo ni dngos po cir mi mthong //
T02D2266:56a-33: na ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
T02D2266:56a-34: gnyug ma'i yid ni go na dge dang mi dge mi 'gos shing //
T02D2266:56a-35: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo ni lhan cig skyes pas bangs par 'gyur //
T02D2266:56a-36: rgyun du bsten na skye shi dang ni 'ching bar 'gyur ba med //
T02D2266:56a-37: ta ni sku gsum gzhung gsum brtan nas shes par gyis //
T02D2266:56a-38: yi ge gsum ni sa ra ha yi tshig la brten te bsgoms //
T02D2266:56b-0: @56b sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyis //
T02D2266:56b-1: de nyid blta zhing bshad pas ci zhig bya //
T02D2266:56b-2: tha ni nam mkha'i zla ba can ni brtan par gyis //
T02D2266:56b-3: gnas rnams bor na legs pa'i lus su ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D2266:56b-4: gnas su brtan par byas na rlung gis skems par 'gyur //
T02D2266:56b-5: brtan por gnas par gyur na tshe 'di 'phel bar 'gyur //
T02D2266:56b-6: da ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis thams cad bsregs dang 'chi med 'gyur //
T02D2266:56b-7: 'o ma gnyis kyis bde mchog de la khrus kyis
T02D2266:56b-8: shig / thig le gnyis ni shes na dag pa'i
T02D2266:56b-9: rang bzhin yin // sdug bsngal gdug pa can ni dngos dang dngos med med //
T02D2266:56b-10: dha ni dha yi rang bzhin bkru bshal byed cing gnas //
T02D2266:56b-11: bkru bshal byed kyang mi mthong nang du zhugs nas song //
T02D2266:56b-12: khrus mkhan mo ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis long //
T02D2266:56b-13: g-yo sgyu'i sbyor ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin du ni gyis //
T02D2266:56b-14: na ni sna tshogs tshul gyis legs par gcig tu 'pho //
T02D2266:56b-15: 'jig rten pa rnams ma go bas na sna tshogs smra //
T02D2266:56b-16: gang phyir 'jigs pa med pa de phyir sho gam 'jal //
T02D2266:56b-17: srid min mya ngan 'das min gzhan yang med pa yin //
T02D2266:56b-18: pa ni bdud rtsi lnga ni sna ru blugs par bya //
T02D2266:56b-19: padma rdo rje sbyar zhing sbyar zhing mnyam nyid 'grub //
T02D2266:56b-20: me tog padma'i rdo rje gdan ni mchod par gyis //
T02D2266:56b-21: padma'i de nyid mi shes bde chen rgyal po min //
T02D2266:56b-22: pha ni spro zhing bsdu ba'i sems 'di nam mkha' lta bu yin //
T02D2266:56b-23: spro ba mi mthong yang ni nam mkha' lta bur 'dod //
T02D2266:56b-24: phat kyi sgra dang h'um gi sgra ni ji ltar 'phro //
T02D2266:56b-25: 'di ltar dpag bsam ljon shing sdong po bzhin du 'phro //
T02D2266:56b-26: ba ni nags kyi tshangs pa'i me tog kha zum bye pa'i rdzing rnams 'dzin //
T02D2266:56b-27: theg cing yid 'ong 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dpyid ka'i yal ga bzhin //
T02D2266:56b-28: dbang du bsdu zhing legs par gar ni nan tan byed //
T02D2266:56b-29: 'gro 'dug byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni rang gi lus la bslangs //
T02D2266:56b-30: bha ni bha ga nyid ni bha ga'i rang bzhin stong par gnas //
T02D2266:56b-31: de ni dge dang mi dge med par mda' bsnun nga yis smras //
T02D2266:56b-32: bla ma'i gsung gis 'dod yon lnga la zo //
T02D2266:56b-33: 'khrul bar ma byed sems nyid 'di ni nam mkha' yin //
T02D2266:56b-34: ma ni nan tan gyis ni yang dang yang du chang 'dzag cing //
T02D2266:57a-1: ldan bla ma bsten pas rtsa ba go bar gyis //
T02D2266:57a-2: gal te rtsa ba'i sems dang blo gnyis gcig tu byed nus na //
T02D2266:57a-3: sems ni shi zhing chad par gyur bas rang bzhin gcig yin no //
T02D2266:57a-4: ya ni gang tshe n'a da dang ni thig le 'dir smras na //
T02D2266:57a-5: rnal 'byor ma yi sgra yis de tsha lhan cig skyes par rtogs //
T02D2266:57a-6: ji ltar rang dgar gnas pa de bzhin du ni brten //
T02D2266:57a-7: skye shi gnyis kyis 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2266:57a-8: ra ni nyi ma zla ba'i thig le nam mkha' bzhin du shi ba med //
T02D2266:57a-9: nyi mas gang na bde ba chen po'i tshul ni shin du mdzes //
T02D2266:57a-10: ra sa n'a ni thig le thig le phob //
T02D2266:57a-11: nyin dang mtshan du gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang du sod //
T02D2266:57a-12: la ni kye ho rlung gi khyim bdag mo de khyim nang long //
T02D2266:57a-13: n'a da thig le long cig chos ni zag med nyid yin no //
T02D2266:57a-14: la la n'a dang bcas dang ra sa aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsa nang nas //
T02D2266:57a-15: thig le 'dzag pa de nyid shin tu ngo mtshar phyir ni 'thung //
T02D2266:57a-16: wa ni chu yi mchog ni rol pas 'thung cig kye //
T02D2266:57a-17: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni rol pas 'phro //
T02D2266:57a-18: gang tshe dpal mo rnal 'byor ma ni lhan cig skyes pas mnyes //
T02D2266:57a-19: de yi tshe na da ma ru ni aa na ha yi skad du grags //
T02D2266:57a-20: sha ni rang bzhin gyis ni lhun grub aa na ha yi sgas //
T02D2266:57a-21: shig le 'dzag pa gang zhig rnal 'byor ma yis mgon //
T02D2266:57a-22: sa ra ha yi tshig gis gsil ba'i sgrar ni bya //
T02D2266:57a-23: nam mkha' 'jo zhing 'jo zhing thig le phob la 'thung //
T02D2266:57a-24: sha ni gang tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog gis mnyes //
T02D2266:57a-25: de tshe rang dang gzhan gyi bag chags 'gags //
T02D2266:57a-26: mnyam dang mi mnyam rnal 'byor ma 'di grub par the tshom med //
T02D2266:57a-27: kye ho mda' bsnun nga ni 'di la the tshom med ces smra //
T02D2266:57a-28: sa ni dngos po 'di kun dngos po med par mnyam //
T02D2266:57a-29: stong pa snying rje 'khrul pas ma spangs shig / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rtag tu mnyes //
T02D2266:57a-30: lhan skyes mchog 'di gang gis kyang ni 'ching mi nus //
T02D2266:57a-31: ha ni kye ho bzhad pa'am skye ba sna tshogs kyis ni tshim //
T02D2266:57a-32: kye ho rmongs pa 'phrog cing bkang yang dga' ba med //
T02D2266:57a-33: gang tshe lus la dbang phyug mdog med chings shig dang //
T02D2266:57a-34: rol pas de tshe bla med legs par 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2266:57b-0: ksha ni yul @57b du lhung na byang chub sems ni chud zos 'gyur //
T02D2266:57b-1: ksha ksha'i sgras ni rgya mtsho dag kyang skems nus na //
T02D2266:57b-2: 'di ni rtsub mo'i bdar bzhin ting 'dzin rnon pos dga' bar 'gyur //
T02D2266:57b-3: kye ho gcer bur thams cad slu bar nges par the tshom med //
T02D2266:57b-4: ka kha do ha zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2266:57b-5: dbang phyug chen po dpal bram ze chen po sa
T02D2266:57b-6: ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so /
T02D2266:57b-8: // / yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i bla ma
T02D2266:57b-9: rnal 'byor pa chen po bee ro tsa na badzra'i
